1270: 姬子，你的身体还撑得住么？
姫子、あなたの身体は、まだ耐えられそうなの？
히메코, 네 몸은 아직 견딜 수 있겠어?
Himeko, is your body still holding up?
Himeko, is your body still holding up?
Himeko, is your body still able to take it?
あなたの心配には及ばないわ。
You're still as stubborn as before, just say it if you feel the pain, there's no other people here.
你还是和以前一样逞强呢，要是疼的话就说出来好，这里除了我也没有别人。
相変わらず強情ね。痛いなら痛いって言いなさいよ。ここには、あたくししかいないんだから。
여전히 고집이 세네. 아프면 아프다고 말해. 여기엔 나밖에 없으니까.
You're as stubborn as ever. You can tell me if you're in pain, there's nobody else here.
You are still as strong as ever, if it hurts then say it well, there is no one else here but me.
You are stubborn as ever. If it hurts, say it hurts. I'm the only one here.
You can think in this way.
そう思ってくれてもいいわよ。
You can think of it like that.
It's okay if you want to think that way.
Huh, I would rather die if I had a mom like you.
哼，要是有你这样长不大的老妈我宁愿疼死。
フンッ、あなたみたいな成長しない母親がいるくらいなら、痛みで死んだ方がマシだわ。
흥, 당신 같은 성장할 줄 모르는 어머니가 있는 것보다는 아픔으로 죽는 게 나을 거예요.
Hmm, it's better to die from the  pain than to have a mother like you that doesn't grow up.
I'd rather die of pain if I had an overgrown mother like you.
Hmph, I'd rather die of pain than have a mother like you who never grew up.
Stop, take this! It should help to reduce your pain, it's a good wine that I spend many efforts to find.
别嘴硬了，拿着！这个应该能帮你减轻一点痛苦，这可是我好不容易找到的好酒哦。
強がらないで、ほら！これで痛みも少しは軽くなるはずよ。やっとの思いで見つけたお酒なんだからね。
강한 척하지 말고, 자! 이러면 아픔도 좀 덜어질 거야. 간신히 찾은 술인 걸.
Stop, take this! It should help to reduce your pain, it's good wine that took me a while to find.
Don't talk tough, take it! This should help ease your pain a bit. This is a good wine that I had a hard time finding.
Don't be so hard on yourself. There you go! This should make the pain a little less. It's the drink I finally found.
……Don't think you can buy me with a bottle of wine.
……别以为用一瓶酒就能收买我。
……お酒なんかで私を買収できると思わないでちょうだい。
……술 따위로 날 매수할 수 있을 거라 생각하지 말아 줘.
...... Don't think you can buy me off with a bottle of wine.
...... Don't think you can bribe me with alcohol.
Hey! Why you're also drinking, everytime you will get mad after drinking, stop!
喂！你怎么也喝上了，你每次喝酒都会发酒疯，别喝了！
ちょっと！どうしてあなたまで飲むのよ？あなた酒グセが悪いんだから、飲まないでちょうだい！
저어! 왜 너까지 마시는 거야? 너 술버릇이 안 좋잖아, 마시지 말라니까!
Hey! Hey! Why are you drinking too? You're a terrible drunk, so don't drink!
Hey! Why are you drinking too? You always go crazy every time you drink. Stop drinking!
Hey! Hey! Why are you drinking too? You're a terrible drunk, so don't drink!
Coo…it's ok, I'm used to it, I won't act like before.
咕…没事，我已经习惯了，不会再像以前那样了。
うぐっ……大丈夫よ。もう慣れたから。以前みたいにはならないわ。
으윽...... 괜찮아. 이젠 익숙해졌으니까. 예전처럼 되진 않을 거야.
(Drinking noises) ...... It's okay. I'm used to it. It won't be like before.
Goo...it's okay, I'm used to it and it won't be like it was before.
Uggg ...... It's okay. I'm used to it. It won't be like before.
Really…I can't stop you now if you do.
真的么…你要是发酒疯我现在可拦不住你。
本当かしら……あなたがお酒で暴れたら、今の私には止められないわよ。
정말일까...... 네가 술판에서 날뛰기 시작하면, 지금의 난 막을 수 없을 텐데.
I wonder if it's true ...... if you went on a drinking binge, I wouldn't be able to stop you now.
Really?...I can't stop you now if you go booze crazy.
I wonder if it's true ...... if you went on a drinking binge, I wouldn't be able to stop you now.

Himeko...I know you hate me a lot.
Himeko......I can see why you resent us.
I chose to leave when you need help the most…I should take the most of responsibilities but I gave them to the kids.
在你们最需要帮助的时候我却选择了离开…本应该承担最多责任的人却把所有的担子扔个了那些孩子。
あなたたちが一番必要としている時にあたくしは立ち去る選択をした……最も責任を負うべき人間が、全ての負担をあの子たちに押し付けたんだからね。
너희들이 가장 필요로 할 때 나는 떠나기로 선택했어…… 가장 책임을 져야 할 사람이 모든 부담을 그 아이들에게 떠넘긴 거니까.
I chose to leave when you needed help the most...the one who should have taken the most responsibility but threw all the burdens on those children.
I made the choice to walk away when you guys needed me the most ...... and the person who should have been responsible the most put all the burden on those kids.
Huh…don't be so arrogant, those kids are strong, even without you they hold to now.
哼…别把自己太当回事了，那些孩子很坚强，就算没有你也勇敢地坚持到了现在。
フンッ……自分が偉いみたいな言い方しないでちょうだい。あの子たちは強いわよ。あなたがいなくても、勇敢にこれまで耐えてきたんだから。
흥…… 자길 대단한 양 말하지 마. 그 아이들은 강하거든. 네가 없어도 용감히 지금까지 버텨왔으니까.
Hm...don't take yourself too seriously, those kids are tough and brave enough to hang in there even without you.
Hmph. ...... Don't talk like you're the big guy. They are strong. They have bravely endured all this without you.
但是…也只能坚持到现在了吧？
でも……裏を返せば、これまで耐えることしかできなかったんでしょ？

But if you turn ...... around, all you've ever done is endure, right?

So what? And what can you do?

あたくしには何もできないわ……あの時と同じように……。
난 아무것도 할 수 없어…… 그때와 마찬가지로…….
I can't do anything...same as that time ......
I can't do anything about it. ...... just like that time. ......

在琪亚娜和你们之间我无法做出选择…虽然琪亚娜变成了现在的样子，但是我对塞西莉亚的约定是不会改变的…我会保护琪亚娜，不让她受到伤害。
キアナとあなたたちの間にいるあたくしには、選択なんてできない……キアナは今のような姿になってしまったけれど、セシリアとの約束は変わっていないもの……あたくしはキアナを守り、彼女を傷つけさせたりしない。

……Hemiko. See Judah now, broken in endless fight, even the unbreakable Judah will break up one day, what about human hearts?
……姬子。你看看现在的犹大，在无休止的战斗中已经布满了裂纹，就连坚不可摧的它都有碎裂的时候，人的内心又能坚强到什么程度呢？
……姫子。今の誓約の十字架を見て。絶え間ない戦いの中で、ヒビだらけになってしまったわ。砕けることがないほど硬い誓約の十字架ですら、ヒビ割れてしまうの。そんな世界で、人の心がどれだけ強くいられると思う？
……히메코. 지금의 서약의 십자가를 봐요. 끊임없는 전투 속에서 금이 가고 말았어요. 부서지지 않을 만큼 단단한 서약의 십자가조차 금이 가 버리는 걸요. 그런 세상에서 사람의 마음이 얼마나 강하게 버틸 수 있을 것 같아요?
...... Himeko. Look at the current Judas, in the endless battle has been covered with cracks, even the indestructible it has broken, the human heart can be strong to what extent?

......Himeko. Look at the cross of the pledge now. It's covered in cracks from all the constant fighting. Even the cross of the covenant, so hard that it cannot be shattered, is cracked. How strong do you think the human heart can be in such a world?

就算我用尽全力救下了希儿，但依然改变不了什么…就算一次又一次地在困难中坚持下来，等待而来的只有无休止的绝望与绝境罢了。

Even though I did my best to rescue Seele, it didn't make a difference in the end... Even if you keep fighting through every setback, over and over, the only thing that awaits you is endless despair and desperation.
Even if I used all my strength to save Hill, but still can not change anything ... even if time and again in the difficulties to persevere, waiting for the only endless despair and desperation.
Even though I did my best to rescue Seele, I couldn't change anything....... Even if you get up from one difficulty or another, all that awaits you is never-ending despair and destitution.

There is no more hope of victory left in man today. ......

姫子、あの子たちを連れてあたくしと一緒に行きましょう。もう疲れたでしょう。こんな世界、あなたたちが戦い続けるに値しないわ。静かな場所を探して、そこで暮らせばいいのよ。あたくしがあなたたちを守るから！

Himeko, take those girls and go with me. You must be tired. This world does not deserve your tireless fighting. Find a quiet place and live there. I will protect you!

Himeko, take those children and go with me, you are already too tired, such a world is no longer worthy of you to continue fighting. Let's find a quiet place to live together, okay? I will protect you with all my might!
Himeko, take those girls and go with me. You must be tired. This world does not deserve you to keep fighting. Find a quiet place and live there. I will protect you!

然后呢…像你一样放弃抵抗乖乖等死么？

No…just make the best of the rest of our life.
不是等死…而是好好把握自己剩下的生命。

I don't want you to die... I just want you to make the best of what time you have left.
It's not about waiting to die...it's about making the most of the life you have left.
Don't wait to die. ...... Live out the life you have left well.

战胜崩坏已经是不可能的事情了，活着的人已经所剩无几，就算继续战斗也只是加速人类的灭亡！我们已经失去了太多了！就不能在最后为自己保留一丝安宁么！
崩壊に勝つのは、もはや不可能なの。生きている人間はもうほとんどいない。戦いを続けても滅亡を早めるだけ！あたくしたちはあまりに多くのものを失った！最後くらい自分たちのために安寧を残したっていいじゃない！
붕괴에 승리하는 건 이제 불가능해. 살아있는 인간은 거의 남아있지 않아. 싸움을 계속해도 멸망만 앞당길 뿐! 우리는 너무 많은 것을 잃었어! 마지막이라도 자신들을 위해 안녕을 남겨도 되잖아!

Winning against the Honkai is no longer possible. There are few people left alive. Continuing to fight will only hasten our demise! We have lost too much! It would be nice to leave some peace for ourselves at least for the last time!

Defeating the collapse is no longer possible, there are few people left alive, even if we continue to fight, it will only accelerate the demise of humanity! We have already lost too much! Can't we keep a little peace for ourselves at the end!

Winning the collapse is no longer possible. There are few people left alive. Continuing to fight will only hasten our demise! We have lost too much! It would be nice to leave some peace for ourselves at least for the last time!
To fight against Honkai, you spend you whole life……can't you……live for yourself in the end?

崩壊と戦うために、あなたはもう自分の一生を費やしたわ……残りの時間を……自分のために生きられないの？
붕괴와 싸우기 위해, 당신은 이미 당신의 일생을 바쳤잖아요... 남은 시간을... 자신을 위해 살 수 없는 거예요?

You've already spent your whole life fighting the collapse, can't you live the rest of your life for ...... yourself?

以前我这么想的时候没有机会，现在有机会了但已经来不及了。

Say no more! We've been on different paths since the day you left. It's too late to go back.
